title: DebtEconomics
description: Specifies selected economics of a debt instrument.

debtSeniority.description: Specifies the order of repayment in the event of a sale or bankruptcy of the issuer or a related party (eg guarantor).

debtInterest.description: Specifies the general rule for periodic interest rate payment.

debtPrincipal.description: Specifies the general rule for repayment of principal.
